entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SW 34 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
